Script Name: Tinychat Maximized Chat ♥
Script Version: 1.0.4
Script Instructions: In order to use this script, you must first install Stylish, once installed, go to my script page and press "install".
-----------------
Step 1: Install "Stylish" for google chrome. https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylish/fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe?hl=en
Step 2: Once installed, come back to this page and click on "Install Style".
-----------------
NOTE: You may need to refresh Tinychat in order for it to work!
Check back from time to time for future updates, I will be updating the CSS every 2-3 weeks.
